title: The Vow (2012) 1080p iTunes
description:
The Vow (2012) 103 min

DESCRIPTION:
Inspired by the real-life story of a newlywed New Mexico couple, who were struck by tragedy shortly after their marriage. A car crash puts the wife in a coma, where she is cared for by her devoted husband. When she comes to, without any memory of her husband or their marriage, the husband must woo her and ultimately win her heart once again.

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x800 23.98 fps h.264 @ 4675 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3
S: English & English SDH

SOURCE:
The.Vow.2012.1080p.BluRay.x264-SECTOR7

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 (with 5.1 software or later)
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV (with 5.0 software; will output file as 720p)
  6. Mixed reports for 2010 iPad 1 (with 5.1 software or later)
